>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G7p2YIGFTAU6uGjL]{Stellar Revelation}

@Icon[type:photon] Photon Revelation

Your equipment has been exposed to the glimmering power of photons so thoroughly that you can effortlessly infuse them with light. When you gain an attunement point in photon mode, you can activate one photon revelation that grants one of your wielded weapons a weapon special property (such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.AJHBDxoH0i3GuKN7]{Luminescent Inquisition (Su)} COM or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.PhSbNFa0cr8bKpYf]{Subduing Beams (Su)} AR) without spending an action. The revelation must have a level of 8 or lower.
